TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstanceDataCollectionCollection extends System.Collections.DictionaryBase

summary.span: 提供 物件的強型別集合。

span.span: Provides a strongly typed collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表從傳回的集合方法。The class represents the collection returned from the method. 這個集合包含所有的計數器與執行個體資料。This collection contains all the counter and instance data. 集合包含每個計數器的物件。The collection contains an object for each counter. 每個物件包含針對該執行個體的所有計數器的效能資料。Each object contains the performance data for all counters for that instance. 因此，資料會編製索引的計數器名稱和執行個體名稱。Thus, the data is indexed by counter name and then by instance name. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示特定的執行個體資料本機電腦上。The following code example displays the instance data for a particular on the local computer. 它會顯示目的編號的清單名稱。It first displays a numbered list of names. 在使用者輸入的其中一個類別目錄數目之後，此範例會取得該。After the user enters the number of one of the categories, the example gets the for that . 然後將轉換所傳回的集合屬性的陣列物件。It then converts the collection returned by the property to an array of objects. 此範例會顯示每個相關聯的執行個體資料每個。The example displays the instance data associated with each of each . [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/CS/instdatakeysvalues.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/VB/instdatakeysvalues.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(string counterName) cil managed
Public Function Contains (counterName As String) As Boolean

span.span: The name of the performance counter.

summary.span: 判斷指定計數器 (由其中一個索引的 物件識別) 的執行個體資料集合是否在集合中。

span.span: Determines whether an instance data collection for the specified counter (identified by one of the indexed objects) exists in the collection.

returns.span: 如果包含指定計數器的執行個體資料集合在集合中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if an instance data collection containing the specified counter exists in the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `counterName`參數不區分大小寫。The `counterName` parameter is case-insensitive. 每個物件在集合中的包含的執行個體的所有計數器的效能資料。Each object in the collection contains the performance data for all counters for an instance. 計數器名稱，然後根據 instance name 被索引的資料。The data is indexed by counter name and then by instance name. 會傳回`true`如果沒有物件，其相關聯的計數器名稱所指定`counterName`參數。 returns `true` if there is an object whose associated counter has the name specified by the `counterName` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例接受分類名稱和從命令列的計數器名稱。The following code example accepts a category name and counter name from the command line. 它會取得for ，然後使用方法，以判斷指定的計數器是否存在。It gets the for the and then uses the method to determine if the specified counter exists. 如果計數器存在，此範例會取得相關聯並顯示集合中的執行個體名稱。If the counter exists, the example gets the associated and displays the instance names from the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection.ItemContains#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection.ItemContains/CS/instdatacolcolitermcontains.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection.ItemContains#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection.ItemContains/VB/instdatacolcolitemcontains.vb#2)]

param.name: counters

param.name: index
param.span: 要加入新執行個體的所在位置。

span.span: The location at which to add the new instances.

summary.span: 從指定索引處開始，將 執行個體的陣列複製到集合。

span.span: Copies an array of instances to the collection, at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法，將轉換成陣列物件。The following code example uses the method to convert an into an array of objects. 每個項目的陣列會傳遞至函式，以便進一步處理。Each element of the array is passed to a function for further processing. summary.span: 為指定的計數器取得執行個體資料。

span.span: Gets the instance data for the specified counter.

value.span: 項目， 物件要根據它來建立索引。

span.span: An item, by which the object is indexed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `counterName`參數不區分大小寫。The `counterName` parameter is case-insensitive. 每個物件在集合中的包含的執行個體的所有計數器的效能資料。Each object in the collection contains the performance data for all counters for an instance. 計數器名稱，然後根據 instance name 被索引的資料。The data is indexed by counter name and then by instance name. 索引子使用`counterName`參數，以逐步執行與此執行個體資料集合相關聯的計數器。The indexer uses the `counterName` parameter to step through the counters associated with this collection of instance data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例接受分類名稱和從命令列的計數器名稱。The following code example accepts a category name and counter name from the command line. 它會取得針對。It gets the for the . 然後，如果存在，此範例會使用屬性 （參考當做索引子） 以取得相關聯並顯示集合中的執行個體名稱。Then, if the exists, the example uses the property (referenced as an indexer) to obtain the associated and displays the instance names from the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection.ItemContains#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection.ItemContains/CS/instdatacolcolitermcontains.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection.ItemContains#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection.ItemContains/VB/instdatacolcolitemcontains.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Keys { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 為與這個執行個體資料集合相關聯的物件取得物件和計數器登錄機碼 (Registry Key)。

span.span: Gets the object and counter registry keys for the objects associated with this instance data collection.

value.span: ，表示一組物件特定的登錄機碼。

span.span: An that represents a set of object-specific registry keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當它安裝，並將計數器資料的寫入，當它執行時，每個軟體元件就會建立它的物件和計數器的金鑰。Each software component creates keys for its objects and counters when it is installed and writes counter data while it is executing. 如同任何其他的登錄資料存取，您可以存取此資料。You can access this data as you would access any other registry data. 不過，雖然您可以使用登錄來收集效能資料，資料不儲存在登錄資料庫中。However, although you use the registry to collect performance data, the data is not stored in the registry database. 相反地，系統會收集的資料，以及適當的系統物件管理員。Instead, the system collects the data from the appropriate system object managers. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用的屬性傳回的計數器名稱，它會將轉換為陣列集合。The following code example uses the property of an to return a collection of counter names, which it converts to an array of . 它會產生的陣列物件，使用屬性。It generates an array of objects using the property. 每個項目陣列中的計數器名稱，方法，它可以顯示的名稱，並呼叫函式來處理相關聯。For each element in the array of counter names, it displays the name and calls a function to process the associated . [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/CS/instdatakeysvalues.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/VB/instdatakeysvalues.vb#4)]
